column4: Hey there, anyone knows if my wifi board can inject?, its an realtek and use the rtl8192se driver (i think)
sorry for my english xD
well most can these days
they did brake the atros chipset on the new kernels
yes, but i did aireplay --test to check it but it said: 0/30 (0%) or something like that
then its not working
yeah i guess
i think your chipset needs a patched driver
they do make live cds just for aircrack
with all the patched drivers
i searched but i could not find one
a live cd? mmm, backtrack 4 for example?
thers a few of them
http://www.aircrack-ng.org/doku.php?id=links#live_distributions
backtrack being the largest will all patched drivers
i see... ok i will try with those live cds, but if they doesn't work i will buy an usb wifi... which one do you recommend me?
well backtrack is the most widely used its a live dvd
someone told me that anyone with chipset atheros will work to inject
being it supports pretty mutch all wifi cards
used to but it got broken in the new keernel
so only backtrack works now
isee, thanks gogeta!
my old belking g+ pcima stil works
